sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clocks-container', templateUrl: './clocks-container.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clocks-container.component.scss'] }) export class ClocksContainerComponent implements OnInit { clocks = []; sortedClocks = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { this.http.get('assets/clocks.json').subscribe((data: any) => { this.clocks = data; //this.sortedClocks = this.clocks.sort((a, b) => a.hour - b.hour); }); } } // export class ClocksContainerComponent { // clocks = [ // { id: 1, hour: 20, minute: 14, second: 8, city: 'Jerusalem' }, // { id: 2, hour: 16, minute: 7, second: 0, city: 'London' }, // { id: 3, hour: 8, minute: 9, second: 0, city: 'Manhattan' }, // { id: 4, hour: 6, minute: 5, second: 0, city: 'Tokyo' }, // ]; // }
